item.title: Troubleshooting
item.author: hans@lammda.se (Hans Thorsen Lamm)
item.description: Development in main branch, then push. Github action generates static content in gh-pages branch. git rm beautifulhugo/ git submodule add https://github.com/halogenica/beautifulhugo.git beautifulhugo
